articles.title: 3 best NBA player props, Knicks vs. Pacers odds for Game 6: Use Siakam and Bridges in 2025 NBA Playoff picks - CBS Sports
articles.description: SportsLine's computer model has revealed three free NBA prop picks for Indiana vs. New York in Game 6 of the Eastern Conference Finals in the 2025 NBA playoffs after evaluating the latest NBA odds
articles.content: The New York Knicks were able to stave off elimination and force a Game 6 against the Indiana Pacers, returning the Eastern Conference Finals to Indiana on Saturday at 8 p.m. ET. The Pacers are 4-poi… [+5682 chars]
